price: Isaan bakka sana (dirree badrii) keessa jiran humna waraana xiqqoo (dha). Akkuma warri gamtaa durii injifataman saniiti (injifatamuuf jiru).
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
